channel.title: hugo on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Just a Memo

item.title: Hugo Install In Gentoo
item.description: Docker docker pull jojomi/hugo Start hugo local server Start once $ docker run --rm --name "hugo" -p1313:1313 \ -v /home/walter/blog:/src \ -v /home/walter/blog/public:/public \ -v /tmp/hugo-build-output:/output \ -e HUGO_BASEURL="192.168.0.199" \ -e HUGO_THEME="walter" \ -e HUGO_WATCH="true" jojomi/hugo Auto start unless stopped $ docker run --restart=unless-stopped --name "hugo" -p1313:1313 \ -v /home/walter/blog:/src \ -v /home/walter/blog/public:/public \ -v /tmp/hugo-build-output:/output \ -e HUGO_BASEURL="192.168.0.199" \ -e HUGO_THEME="walter" \ -e HUGO_WATCH="true" jojomi/hugo New a post $

item.title: Hugo Cheatsheet
item.description: MMark (https://github.com/mmarkdown/mmark) Start mmark In Front Matter add markup = “mmark” then mmark started. MMark 语法说明 (https://mmark.miek.nl/post/syntax/) By now, MMark conflict with {{/* */}} MMark examples table, #ages means table id=ages Name | Age --------|-----: Bob | 27 Alice | 23 Table: This is the table caption. {#ages} code // test.go data Figure: A sample function. 块引用 {title="The blockquote" #myid} > A blockquote with a

item.title: Hugo Theme Development
item.description: Youtube Tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qtIqKaDlqXo&list=PLLAZ4kZ9dFpOnyRlyS-liKL5ReHDcj4G3 有特别帮助的网址 关于整体结构和简单的theme设置 https://www.zeolearn.com/magazine/develop-a-theme-for-hugo 中文网站 https://bwaycer.github.io/hugo_tutorial.hugo/overview/introduction/ 语法高亮的支持 Paginator用法 使用思维导图 Hexo 脑图 Insert javascript into hugo by partial Create custom Shortcodes
